description: A middle school student who is one of the first students to be kind to Mikan. He has the Alice of manipulating shadows. He met Mikan when he saves her from bullies. After he saved Mikan from the bullies, she develops an innocent crush on him. He often enjoys teasing Natsume and sometimes Ruka over Mikan. He is also a member of Watching Over Ruka group.
name: Andou Tsubasa
